member.exception: The call is made inside a thread local scope.

member.summary: Determines whether or not the specified is part of this time span.
member.returns: true if is part of this time span; otherwise false.

member.name: M:Kingo.DateTimeSpan.Contains(System.DateTimeOffset)
member.summary: Determines whether or not the specified is part of this time span.
member.returns: true if is part of this time span; otherwise false.

member.name: M:Kingo.DateTimeSpan.Enumerate(System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Returns all particular points in time that are part of this time span, where each point in time is separated by the given . If represents a positive time span, enumeration will begin at , and all points in time will be in increasing chronological order. If represents a negative time span, enumeration will begin at , and all points in time will be in decreasing chronological order.
member.returns: A lazy initialized collection of points in time.

member.name: M:Kingo.DateTimeSpan.Split(System.TimeSpan,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Splits this time span into several spans, of which all durations match the specified , except (possibly) the last span, which will have a duration of the remaining span of time. If represents a positive time span, enumeration will begin at , and all spans will be in increasing chronological order. If represents a negative time span, enumeration will begin at , and all spans will be in decreasing chronological order.
member.param: The desired duration of each returned span.
If true, the last element of the returned collection will be the remainder of the split-operation, which may or may not have a duration of less than the specified .
member.returns: A lazy initialized collection of time spans.

member.name: M:Kingo.DateTimeSpan.IntersectsWith(Kingo.DateTimeSpan)
member.summary: Determines whether or not this time span intersects with .
member.returns: true if this time span intersects with ; otherwise false.

member.name: M:Kingo.DateTimeSpan.GetIntersection(Kingo.DateTimeSpan)
member.summary: Creates and returns a time span that represents the intersection of this time span and , if it exists.
member.returns: The calculated intersection, or null if no intersection exists.

member.name: M:Kingo.DateTimeSpan.TryGetIntersection(Kingo.DateTimeSpan,Kingo.DateTimeSpan@)
member.summary: Creates and returns a time span that represents the intersection of this time span and , if it exists.
member.param: If an intersection exists, this parameter will refer to the calculated intersection.
member.returns: true if this time span intersects with ; otherwise false.

member.name: M:Kingo.DateTimeSpan.GetDifference(Kingo.DateTimeSpan)
member.summary: Returns a collection of time spans that represent the differences or non-intersecting spans between this time span and . The resulting collection may contain zero, one or two spans, depending on if and how this time span intersects with .
member.returns: The difference between this span and in the form of a collection of spans with either zero, one or two elements.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The scopes were not nested correctly..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Updating instance of type '{0}' to its latest version failed: could not convert latest version of type '{1}' to instance of type '{2}'..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The specified MessageKind ({0}) is not valid..

member.name: P:Kingo.ExceptionMessages.ReadOnlyList_IndexOutOfRange
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to There is no element at index '{0}' (Count = {1})..

member.name: T:Kingo.MicroServices.BadRequestException
member.summary: This exception is thrown by a service when a command or query failed to execute because it was invalid or because the operation was illegal. This type semantically maps to HTTP response code 400.

member.name: M:Kingo.MicroServices.BadRequestException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Kingo.MicroServices.BadRequestException.#ctor(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Kingo.MicroServices.BadRequestException.ErrorCode
member.summary: Returns a value between 400 and 499.

member.name: T:Kingo.MicroServices.DataAnnotations.ChildMemberAttribute
member.summary: This attribute can be used to decorate fields or properties of a to signal that it represents an item, collection or dictionary that should be validated in and of itself. Any validation-errors of the child-member will be added to the set of validation-errors of the parent.

member.name: M:Kingo.MicroServices.DataAnnotations.ChildMemberAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Kingo.MicroServices.DataAnnotations.ChildMemberAttribute.ErrorMessage
member.summary: If specified, defines the error-message that is added to the collection of validation-results if any child-members are invalid. This property cannot be used in combination with the and properties.

member.name: P:Kingo.MicroServices.DataAnnotations.ChildMemberAttribute.ErrorMessageResourceType
member.summary: If specified, defines the resource-type where the localized error-message can be retrieved that is added to the collection of validation-results if any child-members are invalid. This property should be used in combination with the -property.

member.name: P:Kingo.MicroServices.DataAnnotations.ChildMemberAttribute.ErrorMessageResourceName
member.summary: If specified, defines the resource-name of the localized error-message inside the resource-type that is added to the collection of validation-results if any child-members are invalid. This property should be used in combination with the -property.

member.name: T:Kingo.MicroServices.DataAnnotations.ObjectExtensions

member.name: M:Kingo.MicroServices.DataAnnotations.ObjectExtensions.IsNotValid(System.Object,System.Collections.Generic.ICollection{System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.ValidationResult}@,System.IServiceProvider)
member.summary: Determines whether or not the specified is valid, and provides all validation errors if it's not.
member.param: If this instance is not valid, this collection will contain all validation-errors; will be null otherwise.
Optional service provider that can be used to obtain services for validating this instance.
member.returns: true if the instance is not valid; otherwise false.

member.name: P:Kingo.MicroServices.MicroProcessorOperationException.ErrorCode
member.summary: The ErrorCode that is associated with this Exception. This code typically corresponds with HttpStatusCodes, which implies the returned value is always somewhere between 400 and 599, depending on the run-time type of the exception.

member.param: The member to obtain the attributes for.

true to search this member's inheritance chain to find the attributes; otherwise, false. This parameter is ignored for properties and events.

member.summary: Returns a task that completes as the specified is completed, unless the specified request cancellation before the task is completed or the specified expires. In that case, the returned task will complete in the cancelled state.

Optional timeout period that may also cancel the specified .

member.param: The token that can be used to cancel and abort the operation immediately.
The maximum time to wait for the operation to be cancelled. If not specified, the timeout is infinite.
member.returns: A task that will be completed as soon as is signaled or the specified expires.

member.name: T:Kingo.Threading.Context`1
member.summary: Represents a contextual container for a specific value. All instance methods on this class are thread-safe.
member.typeparam: Type of the value to store.

member.name: M:Kingo.Threading.Context`1.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Kingo.Threading.Context`1.#ctor(`0)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Kingo.Threading.Context`1.Current
member.summary: Returns the value of the item that is current with respect to the current thread.

member.name: M:Kingo.Threading.Context`1.OverrideThreadLocal(`0)
member.summary: Sets the current value that is accessible by the current thread through only as long as the scope is active.
member.returns: The scope that is to be disposed when ended.

member.name: M:Kingo.Threading.Context`1.OverrideAsyncLocal(`0)
member.summary: Sets the current value that is accessible by all threads that share the same logical call context through as long as the scope is active.
member.returns: The scope that is to be disposed when ended.
member.exception: The call is made inside a thread local scope.

member.name: M:Kingo.Threading.Context`1.Override(`0)
member.summary: Sets the current value that is accessible by all threads through as long as the scope is active.
member.returns: The scope that is to be disposed when ended.
member.exception: The call is made inside an async local or thread local scope.

member.name: M:Kingo.Threading.Context`1.Dispose
member.summary: Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources.

member.name: T:Kingo.Threading.ContextScope`1
member.summary: Represents a scope that is used to temporarily set the current value of a context.

member.name: P:Kingo.Threading.ContextScope`1.Value
member.summary: Returns the value that is managed by this scope.

member.name: M:Kingo.Threading.ContextScope`1.Dispose
member.summary: Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources.
